text: 7:5 Joel 2:16; Sekaraia 7:3; 1 Tesalonika 3:5Gua poroghamimning, gua akɨrim ragh uaning gasɨ uaningɨn aghuaghuagh, uan inivafɨzimning uaningɨn anogoroghan markɨ. Gua God ko mɨkɨmsɨ, vɨrara ifongegh uaning mɨkɨm suam, ga dughiar otevimɨn uan inivafɨzimning anogoregham, eghtɨ arazir kam dera. Egh arazir kamɨn gɨrara, gua ua uaningɨn porogh. Gua kamaghɨn damuan koghtɨ, Satan gua gifarɨsɨ, gua gakaghontɨ, gua uan inivafɨzimɨn agorogem dɨkabɨnɨva avegh, irɨgham.
